sprache.authkey_info: Your personal Webapi Authkey which is required for downloading Steam maps. Additional information can be found here.
sprache.cant_install: Could not start installation on the server
sprache.collection_info: Workshop Collection ID used for downloading maps. Additional information can be found here.
sprache.error_folder: Error: This user has already this kind of server on the specified port
sprache.error_id: Error: No server could be found
sprache.error_md: Error: Server could not be changed
sprache.error_notinstalled: Error: You need to install a masterserver for this game on the rootserver.
sprache.error_port: Error: A server with the specified port already exists on that server
sprache.error_server_install: Error: Could not start the installation on the server
sprache.error_user: Error: Could not add the user
sprache.failed: Error: Could not establish a connection to the server
sprache.gs_add: Add server step 1: User, Rootserver, games
sprache.help_calendar:
You can define gameserver restarts to every full hour at our restart planer.
This feature comes in handy if you want to switch the game or the template to a given time.
sprache.help_config:
Our webinterface allows you to configre the most important configs for your gameserver. Configs belonging to plugins will be added once they have been installed with the webinterface.

In case you cannot see a config at the webinterface you can still edit with the help of FTP.
sprache.help_md: The gameswitch feature allows you to change games at any time. Our template feature allows you to maintain multiple configurations at a time.
sprache.help_list:
This overview lists detailed gameserver information. For example the active template, FTP data, and so on are listed. The submenus will allow you to do extensive configuration changes.
Game and template can be defined at settings. The Configs area will allow you to manage game and addon settings. If you want to automaticaly change a game or template the restart planer will be of great use for you. Troubleshooting can be done with the Screenlog.
sprache.help_reinstall:
Resynchronisation will add missing files without touching existing ones. The feature comes in handy when you deleted files by accident or new files are shipped out.

Reinstallat will result in a complete reset. All data will be lost and the server be reset to factory defaults.

Both actions are usually done within a few minutes.
sprache.import_destination: Destination server, game and template of import
sprache.import_start: Migration service started. This process will take some time!
sprache.no_server_left: No servers left for this user. Deleting user from the rootserver.
sprache.server_installed: Successfully started the installation on the server.
sprache.updated: The config has been successfully edited
sprache.user_add: Successfully added the user on the rootserver.
